def_cn: （杂志或日历）刊载裸体（或半裸体）女人照片的
def_en: Girlie magazines or calendars show photographs of naked or almost naked women which are intended to please men.

def_cn: 适合少女（或女人）的；女孩子气的；女人味的
def_en: Girlie things are suitable for girls or women rather than men or boys.

def_cn: 丫头（尤指女性不如男子聪明或能干）
def_en: Some people refer to women as girlies, especially when they think they are not as intelligent or able as men.
